name: Cupboard
description: This spacious wooden cupboard combines functionality and elegance. It features six adjustable shelves and sliding doors with a smooth mechanism, making it a versatile storage solution for clothes, accessories, or household items. The durable solid wood construction ensures long-term reliability, while the sleek, minimalist design blends seamlessly with modern interiors.
specifications: Material: Solid wood | Shelves: 6 adjustable | Doors: Sliding mechanism
reviews: The design is elegant, but assembly took time.

name: Sofa
description: This spacious wooden cupboard combines functionality and elegance. It features six adjustable shelves and sliding doors with a smooth mechanism, making it a versatile storage solution for clothes, accessories, or household items. The durable solid wood construction ensures long-term reliability, while the sleek, minimalist design blends seamlessly with modern interiors.
specifications: Material: Solid wood | Shelves: 6 adjustable | Doors: Sliding mechanism

The scratch-resistant surface ensures easy maintenance, while the modern design enhances your dining space's aesthetic appeal.

specifications: Size: King | Frame: Solid wood | Headboard: Upholstered

description: This compact yet stylish coffee table is perfect for any living room setup. Featuring a sleek wooden finish and an additional lower storage shelf, it is designed for functionality and aesthetics. The smooth surface is ideal for placing coffee, books, or decorative items, while the durable construction ensures long-lasting use.

reviews: Perfect size for my small living room.

description: Organize your books and decorative items with this tall and spacious bookshelf. The adjustable shelves allow for flexible storage options, making it ideal for books, plants, or photo frames. description: Experience ultimate relaxation with this recliner chair, designed with a padded backrest and adjustable footrest. name: Wardrobe
description: Keep your clothes organized with this large wardrobe featuring a mirrored door, spacious drawers, and ample hanging space. specifications: Material: Wooden finish | Features: Cable management, 2 cabinets

name: Luxury Chronograph Watch
description: This luxury chronograph watch combines precision and style with a sleek stainless steel design, perfect for those who appreciate both functionality and elegance. Its advanced chronograph features allow for precise timekeeping, while the stylish design makes it ideal for both formal and casual wear.
specifications: Stainless steel case, Water resistant up to 100m, Chronograph function, Leather strap, Quartz movement
reviews: Perfect for both casual and formal wear.

name: Classic Leather Watch
description: A timeless classic, this leather watch is designed for those who appreciate simplicity and elegance. Featuring a genuine leather strap and a minimalist dial, it’s the perfect accessory for everyday wear. The precision quartz movement ensures reliable timekeeping throughout the day.
specifications: Genuine leather strap, Minimalist dial, Quartz movement, Stainless steel case, Water resistant
reviews: The leather strap feels high quality and comfortable.

name: Sporty Digital Watch
description: The Sporty Digital Watch is built for those who lead an active lifestyle. Featuring a large digital display, stopwatch functionality, and water resistance, it is designed to withstand the rigors of daily workouts and outdoor activities. Its sporty design also ensures it looks great during leisure time.

Its intricate design, combined with the beauty of the rose gold tone, makes it a perfect accessory for formal events or special occasions. The slim profile and delicate features ensure it adds a touch of class to any outfit.
specifications: Rose gold-plated case, Slim profile, Sapphire crystal glass, Quartz movement, Leather strap

The watch is built with durable materials, offering precision timekeeping along with a stylish look. Perfect for those who admire aviation history and want a watch that can stand the test of time.
specifications: Aviation-inspired design, Large numerals, Leather strap, Water resistant up to 50m, Mechanical movement

name: Classic Stainless Steel Watch

The solid stainless steel band and case ensure long-lasting wear, while the minimalist design makes it suitable for any occasion. Whether it's a formal event or a casual gathering, this watch will always complement your look.

name: Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra
description: This Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra case combines protection and elegance. Designed to shield your device from daily wear and tear, it provides excellent drop resistance and is made from premium TPU and polycarbonate materials. Its slim profile maintains the sleekness of the Galaxy S22 Ultra while offering a non-slip grip. The case also features anti-yellowing properties for lasting clarity and protection.
specifications: Drop protection, TPU and polycarbonate construction, Anti-yellowing, Slim design, Available in black, clear, and smoke.

description: The OnePlus 9 Pro case is engineered to offer maximum protection with minimal bulk. Featuring a multi-layered design, this case absorbs impact, keeping your device safe from drops, bumps, and scratches. It’s made with high-quality materials, providing a premium look and feel while still maintaining full access to all ports and buttons. The ergonomic design ensures a comfortable grip.

name: Floral Kurti
description: This beautiful Floral Kurti is crafted from premium cotton fabric, offering ultimate comfort and breathability. description: These Slim Fit Jeans are designed to provide a perfect, snug fit while offering maximum comfort. name: Kids' Toy Train Set
description: This colorful toy train set is perfect for kids who love to build and play. With multiple pieces to create tracks and a working engine, it provides hours of fun and stimulates creativity and problem-solving skills.
specifications: Includes 50+ pieces, Electric engine, Easy to assemble.

name: Kids' Bicycle - Razor
description: The Razor Kids' Bicycle is perfect for children learning to ride. With durable tires, a sturdy frame, and adjustable handlebars, it's designed for safety and comfort. Available in a variety of colors.
specifications: 18-inch wheels, Adjustable handlebars, Lightweight frame.
reviews: Easy for my child to ride.

name: Kids' Play Kitchen Set
description: This interactive kids' play kitchen set includes realistic kitchen tools, pots, pans, and play food. Perfect for imaginative play, it helps children develop motor skills, creativity, and social skills while having fun.
specifications: Includes pots, pans, utensils, and play food, BPA-free plastic, Easy to clean.

name: Kids' Soccer Ball - Nike
description: The Nike Kids' Soccer Ball is perfect for young athletes. Designed with durable stitching and vibrant colors, it provides excellent performance for training and casual play.
specifications: Size 3, Durable synthetic leather, Vibrant colors.

name: Kids' Puzzle - 100 Pieces
description: This 100-piece puzzle is a great way for kids to improve their problem-solving skills while having fun. The puzzle features bright, colorful illustrations and is made from durable cardboard.
specifications: 100 pieces, Durable cardboard, Vibrant illustrations.

name: Kids' Dress - Minnie Mouse
description: This cute Minnie Mouse dress is perfect for little ones. Made from soft cotton, it’s comfortable and features adorable prints of Minnie Mouse, making it ideal for everyday wear or special occasions.
specifications: Soft cotton fabric, Disney design, Available in sizes 2-6 years.
reviews: Perfect for a Minnie Mouse fan.

name: Kids' Backpack - Spiderman
description: This Spiderman-themed backpack is perfect for young students. It features adjustable straps, multiple compartments, and a durable design, making it both stylish and practical for carrying books and school supplies.
specifications: Adjustable straps, Multiple compartments, Durable fabric.
reviews: My son loves the Spiderman design.

name: Kids' Shoes - Converse Chuck Taylor
description: These classic Converse Chuck Taylor sneakers are designed for kids. Featuring durable canvas, a comfortable fit, and a timeless style, they’re perfect for everyday wear.
specifications: Durable canvas, Rubber sole, Available in various colors.

name: Kids' Art Set
description: This complete kids' art set includes crayons, markers, colored pencils, paints, and brushes. Everything a young artist needs to create colorful masterpieces.
specifications: Includes crayons, markers, colored pencils, and paints, Safe for children, Easy to clean.
reviews: My child loves painting with it.

name: Aloe Vera
description: Aloe Vera is a popular succulent plant known for its soothing properties and easy-to-care-for nature. It thrives in bright, indirect light and requires minimal watering.
specifications: Indoor plant, low maintenance, needs bright, indirect light.

name: Snake Plant
description: The Snake Plant is an incredibly resilient and low-maintenance plant. It can tolerate a variety of light conditions and is known for improving air quality.
specifications: Indoor plant, air-purifying, needs low to medium light.

name: Peace Lily
description: The Peace Lily is a beautiful indoor plant with glossy green leaves and white blooms. It's known for being easy to care for and has air-purifying properties.
specifications: Indoor plant, blooms white flowers, requires medium light.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: The Fiddle Leaf Fig is a popular indoor plant known for its large, violin-shaped leaves. It adds a tropical feel to any room and needs a bright spot with occasional watering.
specifications: Indoor plant, requires bright light, large leaves.

name: Spider Plant
description: Spider Plants are great for hanging baskets or pots. They’re low-maintenance and propagate easily. They grow well in indirect sunlight and are perfect for beginners.
specifications: Indoor plant, needs indirect light, easy to propagate.

name: Cactus
description: Cacti are resilient plants that thrive in dry, hot conditions. They require minimal watering and are perfect for sunny spots or windowsills.
specifications: Succulent, needs direct sunlight, very low maintenance.

name: Pothos
description: Pothos is a popular trailing plant known for its heart-shaped leaves. It thrives in low light and can grow long vines, making it a perfect hanging or climbing plant.
specifications: Indoor plant, needs low light, easy to propagate.

name: Succulent Mix
description: A collection of various succulents that are perfect for adding texture and color to any room. These plants require minimal watering and thrive in bright, indirect light.
specifications: Assorted succulents, needs bright light, low maintenance.

name: Dracaena
description: The Dracaena is a versatile houseplant known for its spiky leaves and upright growth. It's a perfect addition to any room and needs medium to bright light with minimal watering.
specifications: Indoor plant, needs medium to bright light, upright growth.
